articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Stay calm: Experts discourage 'panic buying' gas after Colonial Pipeline shut down during Hurricane Ida - WRAL.com
articles.description: Hurricane Ida's direct hit on the nation's oil and gasoline industry could send gas prices higher, exacerbating inflation that's already hurting American consumers.

articles.title: European Union recommends new travel restrictions for unvaccinated Americans - The Washington Post
articles.description: The proposed travel restrictions come with caveats: They are not legally binding, and it's up to E.U. members to decide whether to implement them.

articles.title: Top Chinese and American diplomats discuss Afghanistan amid tense relations - South China Morning Post
articles.description: In phone conversation, Foreign Minister Wang Yi says coordination between China and the US over Afghanistan would depend on Washington’s policies towards Beijing in other areas.
